leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-序列分析与注释生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集/解析→QC→比对/组装→注释→评测→工作流

unit.coverage_tools: 读写解析、trim/filter、QC报告、污染检测

tools.name: fastq_set
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for working with 10x Genomics FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools written in Rust for processing FASTQ files generated by 10x Genomics sequencers, handling R1/R2/I1/I2 read files.

tools.name: pairsqc
tools.one_line_profile: QC report generator for Hi-C pairs files
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to generate quality control reports for Hi-C pairs files, developed by the 4D Nucleome Data Coordination and Integration Center.

tools.name: seqqc
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for sequencing data quality control
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed to identify quality control issues with new sequencing data, facilitating automated QC workflows.

tools.name: SOAPnuke
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Quality Control and Preprocessing tool for FASTQ/BAM
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool developed by BGI for integrated quality control and preprocessing of FASTQ or BAM/CRAM files, supporting filtering and trimming.

tools.name: FxTools
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for FASTA and FASTQ manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit developed by BGI for manipulating FASTA and FASTQ files, including various processing utilities.

tools.name: SeqFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile FASTA/FASTQ sequence file analysis and modification tool
tools.detailed_description: A Perl-based tool for analyzing and modifying FASTA and FASTQ sequence files, providing filtering and processing capabilities.

tools.name: FASTX.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for parsing FASTA and FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Julia library for parsing and processing FASTA and FASTQ formatted biological sequence files.

tools.name: RNASeq
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for RNASeq analysis from SRA to DE genes
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for RNASeq analysis, covering steps from SRA file processing to FASTQ generation, QC, mapping, and differential expression analysis.

tools.name: mim
tools.one_line_profile: Auxiliary index to improve parallel FASTQ parsing
tools.detailed_description: A small, auxiliary index designed to massively improve the performance of parallel FASTQ parsing, developed by the COMBINE lab.

tools.name: Bamboo
tools.one_line_profile: QC and error profiling tool for long-read sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A tool for quality control and error profiling specifically designed for long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: UMICollapse
tools.one_line_profile: Fast deduplication for reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accelerating the deduplication and collapsing process for reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMI), optimized for scalability.

tools.name: TrimGalore
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for Cutadapt and FastQC for consistent trimming
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around Cutadapt and FastQC to consistently apply adapter and quality trimming to FASTQ files, with specific functionality for RRBS data.

tools.name: filter-fastq
tools.one_line_profile: Filter reads from a FASTQ file using identifiers
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to filter reads from a FASTQ file based on a provided list of identifiers.

tools.name: ssvQC
tools.one_line_profile: R package for QC of enrichment based NGS assays
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for quality control of enrichment-based NGS assays such as ChIP-seq, Cut&Run, and ATAC-seq.

tools.name: FASTQuick
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra Fast NGS Data QC Tool
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool designed for ultra-fast quality control of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data.

tools.name: dropSeqPipe
tools.one_line_profile: SingleCell RNASeq pre-processing snakemake workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for the pre-processing of SingleCell RNASeq data, handling steps from raw reads to expression matrices.

tools.name: TGSFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast tool for long reads filtering and trimming
tools.detailed_description: An efficient C++ tool designed for filtering and trimming long-read sequencing data (Third Generation Sequencing).

tools.name: quack
tools.one_line_profile: FASTQ quality assessment tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool written in C for assessing the quality of FASTQ files, developed by IGBB.

tools.name: fastprop
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Molecular Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for fast molecular property prediction using mordredcommunity descriptors, applicable in cheminformatics.

tools.name: seave
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for genetic variant filtering and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A web platform that enables genetic variants to be filtered and annotated with pathogenicity prediction scores and annotations from disease databases.

tools.name: FastaParser
tools.one_line_profile: Python FASTA file Parser and Writer
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for parsing and writing FASTA files, facilitating sequence data manipulation.

tools.name: SumStatsRehab
tools.one_line_profile: GWAS summary statistics QC tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for quality control of GWAS summary statistics files, helping to ensure data integrity for downstream analysis.

tools.name: fastq-filter
tools.one_line_profile: Fast FASTQ filter program
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C program for filtering FASTQ files, developed by LUMC.

tools.name: NorotyperII
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Norovirus sequencing data processing
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline for processing Oxford Nanopore sequencing data of norovirus GII, including genotyping and QC.

tools.name: seqparse
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for various sequence file formats
tools.detailed_description: A tool to parse sequence files (GenBank, FASTA, SnapGene, SBOL) and accession IDs to a common format.

tools.name: idemux
tools.one_line_profile: Demultiplexing tool for QuantSeq-Pool FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: A command line tool designed to demultiplex paired-end FASTQ files from QuantSeq-Pool experiments.

tools.name: idemuxcpp
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance demultiplexing and error correction tool
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of iDemux for demultiplexing and error correction of FASTQ files, supporting various RNA-Seq library preps.

tools.name: FastProNGS
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for adapter cutting, QC, and trimming of FASTQ data
tools.detailed_description: A C-based tool used to cut adapters, perform quality control, trimming, splitting, and statistics calculation for FASTQ data.

tools.name: RNAseq-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlined RNA-Seq analysis workflow in R
tools.detailed_description: A repository offering a streamlined RNA-Seq analysis workflow implemented in R, covering steps from quality control to functional analysis.

tools.name: adapterremoval
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid adapter trimming, identification, and read merging
tools.detailed_description: AdapterRemoval v2 is a tool for rapid adapter trimming, identification, and read merging of sequencing data.

tools.name: MegaQC
tools.one_line_profile: Web application to collect and visualise data across multiple MultiQC runs
tools.detailed_description: MegaQC is a web application designed to aggregate, store, and visualize quality control data from multiple MultiQC reports, enabling longitudinal analysis and monitoring of sequencing facility performance.

tools.name: MultiQC
tools.one_line_profile: Aggregate results from bioinformatics analyses across many samples into a single report
tools.detailed_description: MultiQC searches a given directory for analysis logs and compiles a HTML report. It's a general use tool, perfect for summarizing the output from numerous bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: MultiQC_SAV
tools.one_line_profile: MultiQC plugin replicating plots and tables from Illumina's SAV
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for MultiQC that parses Illumina Sequencing Analysis Viewer (SAV) data (InterOp files) to generate sequencing quality reports similar to the original Illumina software.

tools.name: MultiQC_bcbio
tools.one_line_profile: MultiQC plugin for bcbio_nextgen pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for MultiQC that extends its functionality to parse and report quality control metrics specifically from the bcbio-nextgen bioinformatics analysis pipeline.

tools.name: fasterqParseR
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to parse fasterq/fastq dump outputs for SRA scRNAseq data
tools.detailed_description: An R tool designed to parse output files from fasterq-dump, specifically tailored for handling single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) data retrieved from the Sequence Read Archive (SRA).

tools.name: AfterQC
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Filtering, Trimming, Error Removing and Quality Control for fastq data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic quality control of FASTQ data, including filtering, trimming, error removal, and post-QC analysis, designed to simplify the NGS data preprocessing workflow.

tools.name: fastp
tools.one_line_profile: An ultra-fast all-in-one FASTQ preprocessor
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to provide fast all-in-one preprocessing for FastQ files. It performs quality control, adapter trimming, quality filtering, per-read quality pruning, and many other operations with a single scan of the data.

tools.name: fastplong
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast preprocessing and quality control for long-read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance preprocessing and quality control tool specifically optimized for long-read sequencing data (e.g., Nanopore, PacBio), offering functions like filtering and trimming.

tools.name: rnaseq-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq pipeline for raw sequence alignment and transcript/gene quantification
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline developed by Pavlidis Lab for processing RNA-seq data, handling steps from raw sequence alignment to transcript and gene quantification.

tools.name: APAlyzer
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for bioinformatic analysis of alternative polyadenylation (APA) events
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for analyzing alternative polyadenylation (APA) events using RNA sequencing data, utilizing PolyA_DB annotations to examine APA in 3' UTRs and introns.

tools.name: RabbitQCPlus
tools.one_line_profile: A more efficient quality control tool for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A highly optimized quality control tool for NGS data, designed to be faster and more efficient than traditional QC tools, leveraging modern hardware capabilities.

tools.name: grepq
tools.one_line_profile: Quickly filter fastq files by matching sequences to a set of regex patterns
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool written in Rust for efficiently filtering FASTQ records based on regular expression matching of sequences, useful for extracting specific reads.

tools.name: SegataLab Preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Raw sequence metagenomic reads pre-processing: trimming, QC, and host contamination
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools from Segata Lab for pre-processing metagenomic sequencing data, including steps for quality control, trimming, and removal of host contamination.

tools.name: NGS_data_processing
tools.one_line_profile: Tool set for processing fasta/fastq/table formated data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Perl scripts and tools for processing common NGS data formats like FASTA, FASTQ, and tabular data, facilitating data manipulation and format conversion.

tools.name: FilterBanks_FastPythonImplementation
tools.one_line_profile: Filter Banks, Fast Python Implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of filter banks for signal processing, provided by TU Ilmenau. While general signal processing, it is applicable in physical and engineering scientific data analysis.

tools.name: smos
tools.one_line_profile: SMOS soil moisture preprocessing tools
tools.detailed_description: Tools for downloading, reading, and processing Soil Moisture and Ocean Salinity (SMOS) satellite data, including time series conversion.

tools.name: FluLINE
tools.one_line_profile: Flu analysis pipeline for viral species identification and consensus generation
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for Influenza virus analysis, including read filtering, species identification, consensus genome generation, and SNV calling.

tools.name: cfDNApipe
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive quality control and analysis pipeline for cell-free DNA sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline specifically designed for the analysis of cell-free DNA (cfDNA) high-throughput sequencing data, incorporating quality control and downstream analysis steps.

tools.name: SECNVs
tools.one_line_profile: A tool for simulating CNVs for WES data
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool that generates rearranged genomes, short reads (FASTQ), and BAM files to simulate Copy Number Variations (CNVs) in Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) data.

tools.name: cutPrimers
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for trimming primer sequences from amplicon based NGS reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to trim primer sequences from amplicon-based Next-Generation Sequencing reads, ensuring accurate downstream analysis.

tools.name: genetic-data-QC
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for quality control and cleanup for genetic data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for performing quality control and data cleanup on genetic datasets, adaptable for whole genome, exome sequencing, or SNP array data.

tools.name: fastx_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: FASTA/FASTQ pre-processing programs
tools.detailed_description: A collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing, including trimming, splitting, and quality filtering.

tools.name: nimreadfq
tools.one_line_profile: A wrapper to Heng Li's kseq/readfq, an efficient FastQ/Fasta parser
tools.detailed_description: A Nim wrapper for the efficient kseq/readfq library, providing fast parsing capabilities for FASTA and FASTQ files.

tools.name: faster
tools.one_line_profile: A fast program for getting statistics about a fastq file
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based command-line tool for rapidly calculating and displaying statistics from FASTQ files.

tools.name: nxf-fastqc
tools.one_line_profile: A simple fastp-MultiQC nextflow pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline that integrates fastp for preprocessing and MultiQC for reporting, streamlining the QC workflow for sequencing data.

tools.name: seqkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for manipulating FASTA and SAM files
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform and ultrafast toolkit for FASTA/Q file manipulation, providing functions for statistics, formatting, splitting, searching, and more.

tools.name: bisulfite-seq-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of tools to conduct methylation data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for the analysis of bisulfite sequencing data, including alignment and quality control for WGBS, RRBS, and HSBS protocols.

tools.name: hichipper
tools.one_line_profile: A preprocessing and QC pipeline for HiChIP data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing HiChIP data, performing read alignment, quality control, and loop calling to analyze 3D genome organization.

tools.name: umi
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing tools for unique molecular index (UMI) sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: Tools for handling Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs) in sequencing data, including extraction and consensus generation to correct for PCR bias and errors.

tools.name: ForestQC
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control on genetic variants from next-generation sequencing data using random forest
tools.detailed_description: A quality control tool for genetic variants that uses a Random Forest machine learning model to identify and filter high-quality variants from NGS data.

tools.name: bacQC
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics analysis pipeline for assessing the quality of bacterial isolate sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the quality assessment of bacterial isolate sequencing data, automating the QC process for microbiology applications.

tools.name: fastapy
tools.one_line_profile: A lightweight Python module to read and write FASTA sequence records
tools.detailed_description: A simple and lightweight Python module designed for reading and writing FASTA format sequence records, suitable for integration into larger Python-based bioinformatics tools.

tools.name: fastqc-viz
tools.one_line_profile: A modest re-design update for the classic FastQC report
tools.detailed_description: A tool that provides an updated and modernized visualization for FastQC reports, improving the readability and aesthetics of standard QC outputs.

tools.name: BBTools
tools.one_line_profile: Official suite of fast, multithreaded bioinformatics tools for DNA/RNA analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive suite of high-performance bioinformatics tools (including BBMap, BBDuk, BBMerge) for DNA/RNA analysis, covering alignment, trimming, normalization, and more.

tools.name: CpG_Me
tools.one_line_profile: A whole genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) pipeline for alignment and QC
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Whole Genome Bisulfite Sequencing (WGBS) analysis, handling steps from raw FASTQ reads to CpG count matrices, including alignment and quality control.

tools.name: pmultiqc
tools.one_line_profile: A library for QC report based on MultiQC framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that extends or utilizes the MultiQC framework to generate quality control reports, likely for proteomics or specific bioinformatics applications (given 'bigbio' org).

tools.name: kneaddata
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control tool on metagenomic and metatranscriptomic sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for quality control of metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data, specifically performing decontamination (removing host reads) and trimming.

tools.name: biojs-io-fasta
tools.one_line_profile: FASTA file parser for the BioJS ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript component within the BioJS ecosystem designed to parse FASTA formatted biological sequence files, enabling web-based bioinformatics applications to handle sequence data.

tools.name: bionode-fasta
tools.one_line_profile: Streamable FASTA parser for Node.js
tools.detailed_description: A stream-based FASTA parser that is part of the Bionode toolkit, allowing for efficient processing of large biological sequence files in JavaScript environments.

tools.name: fasta-parser
tools.one_line_profile: Buffer Stream parser converting FASTA to JSON
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library that parses FASTA data from buffer streams and converts them into JSON format, facilitating the integration of sequence data into web applications and data pipelines.

tools.name: Plant-Virus-Detection-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for identifying plant viruses in RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An open-source bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect and identify plant viruses from RNA sequencing data, supporting agricultural and microbiological research.

tools.name: fastpdb
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance PDB file parser for Biotite
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based, high-performance drop-in replacement for the PDBFile parser in the Biotite library, accelerating the processing of protein structure files.

tools.name: BLATq
tools.one_line_profile: Modified BLAT for direct FASTQ alignment
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of the BLAT alignment tool adapted to accept FASTQ files directly, facilitating alignment tasks without prior file conversion.

tools.name: ope
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel execution wrapper for FASTA processing tools
tools.detailed_description: A utility that orchestrates the execution of bioinformatics tools on FASTA files using GNU Parallel and parses the results, streamlining batch processing workflows.

tools.name: kseqpp
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of the kseq FASTA/Q parser
tools.detailed_description: A fast C++ library for parsing and writing FASTA and FASTQ files, serving as a re-implementation of the popular kseq library for high-performance sequence handling.

tools.name: scDiagnostics
tools.one_line_profile: Quality assessment for cell type annotations in scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: A set of diagnostic functions designed to assess the quality and reliability of cell type annotations derived from single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: qc3C
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free quality assessment for Hi-C data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing reference-free quality control on Hi-C sequencing data, helping to evaluate library quality and interaction signal strength.

tools.name: ENAsequence-downloader
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for fast downloading of FASTQ files from ENA
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility designed to accelerate and simplify the downloading of raw FASTQ sequence data from the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA).

tools.name: TargetSpecificGATKSequencingPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for microfluidic PCR NGS variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline that processes FASTQ files from microfluidic PCR paired with NGS to produce filtered VCF files using GATK best practices.

tools.name: Atria
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast adapter and quality trimming for Illumina NGS
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance tool implemented in Julia for accurate adapter removal and quality trimming of Illumina Next-Generation Sequencing data.

tools.name: fastx
tools.one_line_profile: Python FASTA/Q parser based on kseq.h
tools.detailed_description: A Python extension that provides fast parsing capabilities for FASTA and FASTQ files by wrapping the efficient kseq.h C library.

tools.name: seqfilter
tools.one_line_profile: Filter FASTA/FASTQ files by ID or length
tools.detailed_description: A command-line utility to filter sequences in FASTA or FASTQ files based on sequence identifiers or length constraints.

tools.name: fastqc-csf
tools.one_line_profile: Fork of FastQC for selected reads in unaligned BAMs
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of the standard FastQC tool, adapted to perform quality control on selected reads from unaligned BAM files.

tools.name: fastpathplanning
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for optimal path finding in safe boxes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing a fast algorithm for finding optimal paths through a collection of safe regions, applicable in robotics and motion planning research.

tools.name: fastq-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for working with FASTQ sequence files
tools.detailed_description: A collection of small, efficient command-line utilities for manipulating, validating, and processing FASTQ sequence files.

tools.name: mtProportion
tools.one_line_profile: Mitochondrial proportion determination for scRNA-seq QC
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing supporting functions to systematically determine mitochondrial proportion thresholds in human and mouse tissues for single-cell RNA sequencing quality control.

tools.name: filterx
tools.one_line_profile: Tabular file processor for genomic formats
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based command-line tool designed to filter and process various tabular genomic file formats including FASTA, FASTQ, GTF, GFF, VCF, SAM, and BED.

tools.name: pychopper
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore cDNA read preprocessing tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for identifying, orienting, and trimming full-length cDNA reads from Oxford Nanopore sequencing data, ensuring high-quality input for downstream analysis.

tools.name: PLUTON
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for NIPT analysis
tools.detailed_description: An automated shell-based pipeline integrating tools like FastQC, Bowtie2, and WisecondorX for the pre-processing of aligned reads and prediction of fetal gender and chromosomal aneuploidies.

tools.name: open_pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: NGS data preprocessing pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pipelines for the preprocessing of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, developed by the Bock lab.

tools.name: RNA_QC_APP
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Shiny app for RNA-seq QC and preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: An interactive R Shiny application designed for comprehensive validation, quality assessment, filtering, and normalization of RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: RASLseqTools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing RASL-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for converting RASL-seq FASTQ files into RASL probe counts, facilitating the analysis of RNA-mediated oligonucleotide annealing, selection, and ligation sequencing data.

tools.name: fastplotlib
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance scientific plotting library
tools.detailed_description: A fast plotting library for Python running on WGPU, designed for high-performance visualization of large scientific datasets.

tools.name: fastpm
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable N-body Particle Mesh solver
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance N-body Particle Mesh solver for cosmological simulations, designed to scale efficiently for large-scale structure formation studies.

tools.name: fastqc-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust implementation of FastQC
tools.detailed_description: A quality control tool for FASTQ files written in Rust, offering a high-performance alternative to the standard Java-based FastQC.

tools.name: auto_process_ngs
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing scripts for Illumina NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A suite of scripts and utilities for the automatic processing and management of Illumina NGS sequencing data, developed for the Bioinformatics Core Facility at the University of Manchester.

tools.name: ngs-preprocess
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-platform NGS preprocessing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for preprocessing NGS data from Illumina, Nanopore, and PacBio technologies, standardizing quality control and data preparation.

tools.name: Fastool
tools.one_line_profile: Simple tool for FASTA/FASTQ reading and conversion
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight C tool for quick reading and format conversion of FASTA and FASTQ files.

tools.name: bioruby-faster
tools.one_line_profile: Fast FASTA/FASTQ parser for BioRuby
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby extension that provides a fast and simple parser for FASTA and FASTQ files, integrating with the BioRuby environment.

tools.name: faster-fasta
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance FASTA/FASTQ processing tool
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool written in Rust for fast parsing, sorting, deduplication, filtering, and statistical analysis of FASTA and FASTQ files.

tools.name: Je
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for handling barcoded and UMI-tagged FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools designed to process barcoded FASTQ files, supporting demultiplexing and duplicate filtering using Unique Molecule Identifiers (UMIs).

tools.name: FastQC-mirror
tools.one_line_profile: Mirror of the FastQC quality control tool
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting the source code for FastQC, a standard tool for quality control checks on raw sequence data coming from high throughput sequencing pipelines.

tools.name: BAQCOM
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-Seq analysis pipeline for QC and mapping
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool for RNA-Seq analysis that handles quality control, mapping, and read counting.

tools.name: pipeline-perl
tools.one_line_profile: Perl-based genomic data processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Perl tools and scripts to process raw FASTQ data and produce meaningful genomic data, likely used for variant calling or similar analysis.

tools.name: TranscriptomeAssemblyTools
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for transcriptome assembly preprocessing and evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts designed to process FASTQ files to improve de novo transcriptome assemblies and to evaluate the quality of those assemblies.

tools.name: Ktrim
tools.one_line_profile: Extra-fast and accurate adapter- and quality-trimmer for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and efficient tool designed for trimming adapters and filtering low-quality bases from NGS sequencing data, optimized for speed.

tools.name: scQCEA
tools.one_line_profile: R package for Annotation and Quality Control Report of Single-Cell RNA-Sequencing Data
tools.detailed_description: A software tool designed to streamline the quality control and annotation process for single-cell RNA sequencing datasets, generating comprehensive reports.

tools.name: WGS-QC-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for Quality Control of Whole Genome Sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A workflow built with Snakemake to automate the quality control steps for Whole Genome Sequencing (WGS) data analysis.

tools.name: Atropos
tools.one_line_profile: Specific, sensitive, and speedy NGS read trimming tool
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient tool for trimming adapter sequences and low-quality bases from Next-Generation Sequencing reads, designed as a faster drop-in replacement for Cutadapt.

tools.name: st_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Tools to process and analyze Spatial Transcriptomics FASTQ data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline containing scripts and tools for processing raw FASTQ files generated by Spatial Transcriptomics methods, handling mapping and demultiplexing.

tools.name: EARRINGS
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient adapter removal design for large-scale NGS meta-analyses
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool designed for high-throughput adapter removal, specifically optimized for large-scale meta-analyses of NGS data.

tools.name: Tailor
tools.one_line_profile: Fast short read aligner for discovering trimming and tailing events
tools.detailed_description: A specialized short read aligner designed to identify 3' trimming and tailing events in small silencing RNAs, distinct from general purpose aligners.

tools.name: TaxTriage
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow to identify and classify microbial organisms in mNGS data
tools.detailed_description: A flexible Nextflow pipeline for metagenomic NGS data analysis, focusing on the identification and classification of microbial organisms from short or long reads.

tools.name: fqzcomp
tools.one_line_profile: Fastq compression tool
tools.detailed_description: A specialized compression utility for FASTQ files, offering high compression ratios for sequencing data storage.

tools.name: fastq_generator
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of tools to generate random or mapped fastq files
tools.detailed_description: A utility for generating synthetic FASTQ files, useful for testing and benchmarking bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: isoblat
tools.one_line_profile: Use RNA transcripts to assess assembly quality via BLAT output
tools.detailed_description: A Perl tool that parses BLAT output to assess genome assembly quality by mapping RNA transcripts to contigs/scaffolds.

tools.name: re-pair
tools.one_line_profile: Program to re-do the pairing of fastq reads
tools.detailed_description: A utility to fix or restore pairing information in FASTQ files, often needed when reads become disordered during processing.

tools.name: ncov-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for performing quality control on coronavirus sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools specifically designed for the quality control and analysis of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) genomic sequencing data.

tools.name: FastaValidator
tools.one_line_profile: Java library to parse and validate FASTA formatted sequences
tools.detailed_description: A Java library providing functionality to parse and strictly validate the format of FASTA sequence files.

tools.name: Librarian
tools.one_line_profile: Predict sequencing library type from FastQ base composition
tools.detailed_description: A tool that infers the library preparation type and orientation from the base composition of FASTQ files, aiding in downstream analysis configuration.

tools.name: fastqcr
tools.one_line_profile: Quality Control of Sequencing Data in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides functions to run FastQC and aggregate the reports, facilitating quality control of sequencing data within R workflows.

tools.name: EEG-ICA-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: ICA preprocessing & source localization for EEG
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB pipeline for processing Electroencephalography (EEG) data using Independent Component Analysis (ICA) for artifact removal and source localization.

tools.name: pfasta
tools.one_line_profile: A Pedantic FASTA Parser and Tool Set
tools.detailed_description: A strict and efficient FASTA parser written in C, designed to handle sequence data with high correctness and performance.

tools.name: FastQt
tools.one_line_profile: FastQC port to Qt5: A quality control tool for high throughput sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface (GUI) implementation of the FastQC tool using Qt5, allowing users to perform quality control on sequencing data interactively.

tools.name: FastqCleaner
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny Application for Quality Control, Filtering and Trimming of FASTQ Files
tools.detailed_description: An interactive R Shiny application that provides a user-friendly interface for processing, filtering, and trimming FASTQ sequencing files.

tools.name: klib.nim
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental FASTA/Q parser and interval queries in nim-lang
tools.detailed_description: A Nim language port/implementation of the klib library, providing efficient parsing for FASTA/FASTQ files and interval query functionalities for bioinformatics.

tools.name: pre-pe
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing paired-end reads produced with experiment-specific protocols
tools.detailed_description: A tool for preprocessing paired-end sequencing reads, specifically handling custom protocols and read configurations.

tools.name: fastx-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: C Library to work with fasta/q files
tools.detailed_description: A collection of command line tools for Short-Reads FASTA/FASTQ files preprocessing, including trimming, quality filtering, and format conversion.

tools.name: QClus
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to improve the quality of single-nucleus RNA sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for filtering nuclei and removing technical artifacts in single-nucleus RNA sequencing (snRNA-seq) data to improve downstream analysis quality.

tools.name: MerKurio
tools.one_line_profile: Quick k-mer-based FASTA/FASTQ sequence record extraction
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based tool for efficient extraction and filtering of FASTA/FASTQ and SAM/BAM records using k-mer based matching and tagging.

tools.name: Cutadapt
tools.one_line_profile: Removes adapter sequences from sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: A widely used tool for finding and removing adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and other unwanted sequence from high-throughput sequencing reads.

tools.name: seq_io
tools.one_line_profile: FASTA and FASTQ parsing in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Rust library for parsing FASTA and FASTQ file formats, designed for speed and low memory usage in bioinformatics applications.

tools.name: ontime
tools.one_line_profile: Extract subsets of ONT (Nanopore) reads based on time
tools.detailed_description: A tool to filter and extract Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing reads based on their acquisition timestamp.

tools.name: slide_snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for spatial transcriptomics data
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for the preprocessing, alignment, quality control, and quantification of spatial transcriptomics data (short and long read).

tools.name: WES Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Whole Exome Sequencing end-to-end pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for Whole Exome Sequencing (WES) analysis, covering QC, trimming, alignment, and variant calling.

tools.name: ArtificialFastqGenerator
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating artificial fastq files
tools.detailed_description: A software tool capable of generating synthetic FASTQ files with customizable error rates and quality scores for testing NGS analysis pipelines.

tools.name: MiTools
tools.one_line_profile: NGS data processing tool based on MiLib
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for processing Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, built upon the MiLib library, facilitating various sequence analysis tasks.

tools.name: ChIPSeqFPro
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for ChIP-seq data processing from FASTQ to BigWig
tools.detailed_description: A shell script pipeline that automates the processing of ChIP-seq data. It integrates FastQC for quality control, BWA for alignment to human or mouse genomes, MACS for peak calling, and bam2bigwig for visualization file generation.

tools.name: rnaSeqFPro
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for RNA-seq data processing and differential expression analysis
tools.detailed_description: A shell script pipeline for RNA-seq analysis starting from FASTQ files. It performs QC with FastQC, alignment with STAR, quantification with featureCounts, and differential expression analysis using DESeq2.

tools.name: NGS QC Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for quality check and filtering of NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for quality control and filtering of next-generation sequencing data, supporting both Roche and Illumina platforms. It provides tools for data cleaning prior to downstream analysis.

tools.name: Ancient_mtDNA_Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing ancient mtDNA target enrichment data
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline specifically designed for processing paired-end Illumina reads obtained from ancient mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA) target enrichment capture experiments.

tools.name: kseq-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Fast FASTA/FASTQ parser library for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust implementation of the kseq library, providing efficient parsing capabilities for FASTA and FASTQ biological sequence formats.

tools.name: nf-skyline-dia-ms
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for DIA proteomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed for performing Data-Independent Acquisition (DIA) proteomics analysis, likely integrating with Skyline software.

tools.name: TidyMultiqc
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for MultiQC reports into Tidy data frames
tools.detailed_description: An R package that parses 'MultiQC' reports and converts the summary statistics into tidy data frames, facilitating downstream analysis and visualization of quality control metrics.

tools.name: qcat
tools.one_line_profile: Demultiplexing tool for Oxford Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool developed by Nanopore Tech for demultiplexing Oxford Nanopore FASTQ files based on barcodes.

tools.name: sra-human-scrubber
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to remove human reads from clinical FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by NCBI to identify and remove significant human reads from clinical infection samples in FASTQ format, ensuring privacy and compliance for SRA submissions.

tools.name: HMAS-QC-Pipeline2
tools.one_line_profile: QC and denoising pipeline for highly-multiplexed amplicon sequencing
tools.detailed_description: An analysis pipeline for initial quality control and denoising of highly-multiplexed amplicon sequencing (HMAS) data, updated to function without mothur.

tools.name: fastqtk
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight tools for FASTQ manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of lightweight, efficient tools written in C for processing and manipulating FASTQ files.

tools.name: nf-core/bamtofastq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to convert BAM/CRAM to FASTQ with QC
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline that converts BAM or CRAM alignment files back to FASTQ format and performs quality control checks on the output.

tools.name: nf-core/crisprseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for CRISPR edited data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for analyzing CRISPR edited data, supporting both targeted NGS data for editing quality evaluation and CRISPR pooled DNA screens for gene discovery.

tools.name: nf-core/detaxizer
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for taxonomic classification and filtering
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify and optionally remove specific taxon sequences (e.g., human contamination) from raw genomic data.

tools.name: nf-core/hgtseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for horizontal gene transfer investigation
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline to detect and investigate horizontal gene transfer events using NGS data.

tools.name: nf-core/seqinspector
tools.one_line_profile: Dedicated QC-only pipeline for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline focused solely on quality control for sequencing data, running multiple QC tools and generating global and group-specific MultiQC reports, suitable for core facilities.

tools.name: ChronQC
tools.one_line_profile: Longitudinal quality control monitoring for NGS
tools.detailed_description: A tool for tracking and visualizing quality control metrics over time, allowing labs to monitor the performance of their sequencing processes.

tools.name: autoadapt
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic quality control for FASTQ sequencing files
tools.detailed_description: A tool that provides automatic quality control and adapter trimming for FASTQ sequencing files.

tools.name: metagenome_assembly_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenome assembly and binning
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to process raw sequencing data into high-quality metagenomic bins and generate visualizations.

tools.name: mpox-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Monkeypox virus assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for Monkeypox virus (MPXV) assembly, including host removal, reference-based assembly, and QC metrics generation for Illumina paired-end data.

tools.name: nanogo
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive bioinformatics pipeline for Oxford Nanopore
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Oxford Nanopore Technologies data, offering Dorado-based basecalling, amplicon assembly, primer trimming, and quality control.

tools.name: SNIKT
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-independent adapter and contamination removal
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the sequence-independent identification and removal of adapters and systemic contamination in shotgun sequencing data.

tools.name: fqc
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible quality control dashboard for FASTQ
tools.detailed_description: An extensible quality control dashboard built for assessing FASTQ files, providing visualizations of sequencing quality metrics.

tools.name: sequence-stats
tools.one_line_profile: FASTQ/FASTA statistics and manipulation scripts
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Bash scripts to generate statistics from FASTQ and FASTA files, and perform manipulations like renaming, sorting, and format conversion.

tools.name: sequali
tools.one_line_profile: Fast sequencing data quality metrics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating quality metrics for sequencing data efficiently, useful for QC assessment.

tools.name: FQFeeder
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-threaded FASTA/FASTQ parser
tools.detailed_description: A self-contained, multi-threaded library for parsing FASTA and FASTQ files, designed for high-performance sequence data ingestion.

tools.name: fastq.bio
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web tool for DNA sequencing QC
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web-based tool for performing quality control on DNA sequencing data, allowing users to visualize QC metrics directly in the browser.

tools.name: fastq.bio-serverless
tools.one_line_profile: Serverless web tool for DNA sequencing QC
tools.detailed_description: A serverless implementation of the fastq.bio tool, using Cloudflare Workers and WebAssembly to perform client-side quality control of sequencing data.

tools.name: minion_multiQC
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-tool QC wrapper for MinION data
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper script that aggregates quality control metrics for MinION sequencing data using multiple tools.

tools.name: minion_qc
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control for MinION sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: An R-based tool for generating quality control reports and plots specifically for Oxford Nanopore MinION sequencing data.

tools.name: Fast5-to-Fastq
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting reads from Oxford Nanopore fast5 files
tools.detailed_description: A simple Python utility to extract FASTQ sequence data from Oxford Nanopore FAST5 files.

tools.name: PyPore
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Nanopore data QC, conversion, and alignment
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for fast and accurate quality control, format conversion, and alignment of Nanopore sequencing data.

tools.name: FastQC
tools.one_line_profile: Standard quality control tool for high throughput sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A widely used quality control tool for high throughput sequence data. It provides a modular set of analyses which you can use to give a quick impression of whether your data has any problems of which you should be aware before doing any further analysis.

tools.name: mgikit
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for MGI FASTQ demultiplexing and QC
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for demultiplexing FASTQ files from MGI sequencers and generating demultiplexing and quality reports.

tools.name: seq-quality-trimming
tools.one_line_profile: Quality trimming for Sanger sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: A Python script for trimming Sanger sequencing reads based on quality scores.

tools.name: Fastaq
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts to manipulate FASTA and FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: A suite of Python scripts for manipulating FASTA and FASTQ files, including conversion, filtering, and statistics generation.

tools.name: flexbar
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible barcode and adapter removal tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the flexible removal of barcodes and adapters from sequencing data, supporting various trimming modes and filtering options.

tools.name: sequana/fastqc
tools.one_line_profile: Sequana pipeline for parallel FastQC
tools.detailed_description: A Sequana pipeline designed to run FastQC in parallel on multiple samples and summarize the results using MultiQC.

tools.name: FastPCC
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Phase Cross-Correlation for seismic noise
tools.detailed_description: A tool for computing interstation correlations of seismic ambient noise, implementing fast versions of standard, 1-bit, phase, and wavelet phase cross-correlations.

tools.name: SeqKit
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform and ultrafast toolkit for FASTA/Q file manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit for processing FASTA/Q formats, providing functions for statistics, formatting, searching, and set operations with high performance.

tools.name: GEfetch2R
tools.one_line_profile: R package for retrieving and converting public RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R tool designed to access Single-cell and Bulk RNA-seq data from public repositories and benchmark subsequent format conversion tools.

tools.name: QC3
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control tool for DNA sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A quality control tool designed for DNA sequencing data, covering raw data, alignment, and variant calling stages.

tools.name: Falco
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance C++ alternative to FastQC
tools.detailed_description: A C++ drop-in replacement for FastQC to assess the quality of sequence read data, offering faster processing speeds for large datasets.

tools.name: pyPaSWAS
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based sequence alignment and trimming tool with GPU support
tools.detailed_description: An extended Python version of PaSWAS for DNA/RNA/protein sequence alignment, read mapping, and trimming, supporting OpenCL and CUDA acceleration.

tools.name: Trimmomatic
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible read trimming tool for Illumina NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A famous command line tool for trimming and cropping Illumina (FASTQ) data as well as removing adapters.

tools.name: VSEARCH
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile open-source tool for microbiome analysis
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance tool for metagenomics, supporting sequence clustering, chimera detection, dereplication, searching, and shuffling.

tools.name: gfastats
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and exhaustive tool for genome assembly summary statistics
tools.detailed_description: A single fast tool for generating summary statistics and performing simultaneous manipulation of FASTA, FASTQ, and GFA genome assembly files.

tools.name: NanoQC
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control tools for nanopore sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool specifically designed for investigating the quality of long-read sequencing data from Oxford Nanopore Technologies.

tools.name: NanoFilt
tools.one_line_profile: Filtering and trimming of long read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering and trimming long-read sequencing data (Nanopore/PacBio) based on quality and length.

tools.name: HighPerformanceNGS
tools.one_line_profile: High performance tools for working with FASTQ and BAM files
tools.detailed_description: A collection of C-based high-performance utilities for processing and manipulating NGS data formats like FASTQ and BAM.

tools.name: cfutils
tools.one_line_profile: Chromatogram File Utils for Sanger sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package integrating trace visualization, mutation calling, and quality control specifically for Sanger sequencing chromatogram files.
